summary: This mod adds a new home for the player. It is intended to be for a mage .The new home is a tower.I hope you like it.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=7][color=#FF7700][center]The Mage Tower 2v[/center][/color][/size][/b] 
                            

[color=#FF1511]NOTE : This mod is not expansion of any other mod. This was made all by me.[/color]

Version: 2v
Author: Alex


[size=5][color=#FFE62B][center]=================
Description:
=================[/center][/color][/size]

This mod adds a new home in Skyrim. This is a home for a mage and it is not big but a small cozy and comfortable place.
It is located close to Half-Moon Mill. There is also a mini quest. You can start it from the book named The Mage Tower witch is located in Drangosreach in Farengar\'s cabin (the green book)..Also there is a map marker witch is always visible. I hope you like the new update.
You can find in this home:
[list]
[*] 2 Weapon Racks
[*] 2 Book Shelfs
[*] Chest
[*] Arcane Enchanter
[*] Alchemy Lab 
[*] and more.
In the basement:
[*]Workbench
[*]More Weapon Racks
[*]Grindstone
[*]and more.[/list]

[color=#21FFF7][size=3][center]Also check my other mod[/size]
[url=file.php?id=15508][size=3]Better Fast Travel - Carriages and Ships
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15101-1-1335165929.png[/img][/size][/url][/center][/color]

[size=5][color=#FFE62B][center]=================
NMM Installation:
=================[/center][/color][/size]

1. Open the archive in NMM.
2. Activate the mod.

[size=5][color=#FFE62B][center]===============
Manual Install
===============[/center][/color][/size]

To install this mod manual follow the steps:
1. Open the WinRAR archive.
2. Go to your Skyrim Data folder.
3. Extrakt the WinRAR archive in the Data.
4 Check twice to be sure that the esm is checked.

[size=5][color=#FFE62B][center]===============
Manual Un-Install
===============[/center][/color][/size]

1. Go to the Skyrim Data folder and delete the esp from this mod.

[size=5][color=#FFE62B][center]===============
NMM Un-Install
===============[/center][/color][/size]

Check the mod to be deactivate


[size=5][color=#FFE62B][center]=================
History:
=================[/center][/color][/size]

- Mod update History-
1v - first update.
2v - a new basement with a lot of things

[size=5][color=#FFE62B][center]=================
Licensing/Legal:
=================[/center][/color][/size]

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod.

If I do not respond within 2 weeks, feel free to do whatever you like with this mod.
author: Alex
